item.title: Roadmap
item.description:
• 1.0 Release
    • Back End
      • "Anonymous" imported contacts should be listed by email address
      • Add manual ability to "Generate New Key" on Setup
      • Allow GPG/PGP fingerprints in "To:" and (possibly) "CC:" and "BCC:" fields
      • Allow static HTTP content to be cached by the browser
      • Create a command that manually "Threads" together mail
      • Create global javascript object with various internationalized strings mapped to keys
      • Delete mail off source.
      • Detect image attachment proper rotation
      • Encrypted public key should be decrypted and properly imported
      • Errors sending mail need to be communicated to the user somehow
      • Finish implementing /async/
      • Fix Threading of Messages
      • IMAP STARTTLS port 143 not connecting
      • Implement OpenPGP support (master ticket)
      • Implement STARTtls-everywhere
      • Implement a fix for Gmail's crazy disabled IMAP
      • Implement better Signature & Quote detection
      • Implement support for Libravatar and/or X-Face
      • Improve & Fix Bugs in Setup Flow
      • Improve PGP Support
      • Improve PGP compatibility of outoing mail?
      • Internal error whitescreen after changing security settings
      • MailLock!!! - a lock screen for your Mailpile
      • Mails are accidentally merged into one conversation solely based on the subject
      • Make "metadata.flags.replied" account for "draft" state messages
      • Make documentation for Commands and arguments
      • Make paths in config relative when possible
      • Make tag "slug" allow for numerical "0" values
      • Manually tagging messages as Drafts causes bad behavior
      • Message in tag count discrepancy
      • Need to be able to run more than one Mailpile at a time on the same machine
      • No TLS/SSL cert validation
      • PGP Encrypt & Sign fail poorly if Profile is missing PGP key
      • Parse JSON-LD objects from mail and display actions in frontend
      • Properly implement smart "crypto policy" support on a per-contact basis
      • Provide failing feedback if plugin manifest is malformed
      • Quoted Text in PGP Email Replies Should Be Off by Default (opt-in)
      • Separate web login password
      • Support Proxies
      • Support for Maildir flags and read/unread states
      • Two factor authentication support?
      • Use the Python appdirs module to choose app data directory
      • Using "export" fails
      • smtp server not working
      • « View source » is showing debug information
    • Bugs
      • Add contact failure
      • Chars from PGP Key UIDs not always properly ASCII decoded
      • Encrypted public key should be decrypted and properly imported
      • Filters not clearing tag reference on tag/delete
      • Fix Threading of Messages
      • Folders not visible on lower resolutions
      • Handle GPG errors more gracefully and in a way that is useful to the user (renamed)
      • IMAP source ignores server read/unread
      • Implement a fix for Gmail's crazy disabled IMAP
      • Internal error whitescreen after changing security settings
      • Malformed Subject lines (from Yahoo Conversations)
      • Manually tagging messages as Drafts causes bad behavior
      • No TLS/SSL cert validation
      • PGP Encrypt & Sign fail poorly if Profile is missing PGP key
      • Provide better UI feedback of Unread messages in thread
      • UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xe2 in position 0: ordinal not in range(128)
      • Windows launcher crashes on shutdown
      • « View source » is showing debug information
    • Design
      • Folders not visible on lower resolutions
      • Improve & Fix Bugs in Setup Flow
      • Improve PGP Support
      • Rethink UX / UI of "Bulk Tag Picker"
    • Discussions
      • Implement STARTtls-everywhere
      • Improve PGP compatibility of outoing mail?
    • Documentation
      • Make documentation for Commands and arguments
    • Front End
      • Add "Drag & Drop" functionality of thread to Tags
      • Add "actions" to Conversation Thread
      • Add a "Lazy Loading" for search views
      • Add ability to drag & drop tags onto message Thread View
      • Add manual ability to "Generate New Key" on Setup
      • Add nice UI handling of non image attachments
      • Add some sanity & migrate the wild west of our JS code to some sensible order
      • Allow GPG/PGP fingerprints in "To:" and (possibly) "CC:" and "BCC:" fields
      • Better explain "Missing Key" and provide useful UI actions for PGP
      • Change "spam" and "trash" views to not display tag information
      • Create "crypto_state" for Attachment parts
      • Create JS hidden / secret / pass reveal plugin
      • Create a command that manually "Threads" together mail
      • Create global javascript object with various internationalized strings mapped to keys
      • Errors sending mail need to be communicated to the user somehow
      • Expose contacts search/filter mechanism in web UI
      • Finish implementing /async/
      • Fixed width font in message view?
      • Implement "Import Key" from within message thread
      • Implement "Notifications" UI dropdown tab
      • Implement a fix for Gmail's crazy disabled IMAP
      • Improve & Fix Bugs in Setup Flow
      • Improve CSS styling of HTML emails
      • Improve PGP Support
      • Improve upon "Photo Attachments" in message view
      • Internal error whitescreen after changing security settings
      • MailLock!!! - a lock screen for your Mailpile
      • Make "New" counts on sidebar update
      • Make "People in Conversation" match Contacts view
      • Make Setup Complete screen show downloading data
      • Make Sidebar "subtags" actually usable
      • Make clickable "Quote" reply text in Composer
      • Make contacts in "Composer" allow for PGP keydiscovery
      • Make drag & drop use native HTML5 instead of jQuery UI
      • Make expanded Sidebar Tags stay expanded on refresh
      • Make front-end show helpful screen if Python service crashes
      • Manually tagging messages as Drafts causes bad behavior
      • PGP Encrypt & Sign fail poorly if Profile is missing PGP key
      • Parse JSON-LD objects from mail and display actions in frontend
      • Provide UI confirmation feedback after "Add Contact"
      • Provide better UI feedback of Unread messages in thread
      • Refactor Composer JS code
      • Reply to a specific message in a thread from UI
      • Rethink UX / UI of "Bulk Tag Picker"
      • Two factor authentication support?
      • Update crypto icons on messages as per ModernPGP spec
    • IMAP
      • IMAP STARTTLS port 143 not connecting
      • IMAP source ignores server read/unread
      • Improve & Fix Bugs in Setup Flow
      • Reduce "noise" in the UI when messages have semantically equivalent mail-source tags and global tags
    • Low Hanging Fruit
      • Add "Drag & Drop" functionality of thread to Tags
      • Add "actions" to Conversation Thread
      • Add nice UI handling of non image attachments
      • Allow static HTTP content to be cached by the browser
      • Change "spam" and "trash" views to not display tag information
      • Chars from PGP Key UIDs not always properly ASCII decoded
      • Create JS hidden / secret / pass reveal plugin
      • Create a command that manually "Threads" together mail
      • Create package for YunoHost
      • Expose contacts search/filter mechanism in web UI
      • Filters not clearing tag reference on tag/delete
      • Flesh out mailpile.plugin.demos
      • Implement better Signature & Quote detection
      • Implement support for Libravatar and/or X-Face
      • Improve CSS styling of HTML emails
      • Improve upon "Photo Attachments" in message view
      • MailLock!!! - a lock screen for your Mailpile
      • Make "New" counts on sidebar update
      • Make "People in Conversation" match Contacts view
      • Make Sidebar "subtags" actually usable
      • Make documentation for Commands and arguments
      • Make expanded Sidebar Tags stay expanded on refresh
      • Parse JSON-LD objects from mail and display actions in frontend
      • Provide UI confirmation feedback after "Add Contact"
      • Strip out noisy junk from "Subject" lines
      • Support Proxies
      • Support for Maildir flags and read/unread states
      • UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xe2 in position 0: ordinal not in range(128)
      • WAB importer
    • Packaging & Defaults
      • Create package for YunoHost
      • Improve & Fix Bugs in Setup Flow
      • Make paths in config relative when possible
      • NAT-PMP/UPnP Port Forwarding
      • Need to be able to run more than one Mailpile at a time on the same machine
      • Non standard directories (linux)
      • Reduce "noise" in the UI when messages have semantically equivalent mail-source tags and global tags
      • Use the Python appdirs module to choose app data directory
    • Plugins
      • Flesh out mailpile.plugin.demos
      • Parse JSON-LD objects from mail and display actions in frontend
      • UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xe2 in position 0: ordinal not in range(128)
      • WAB importer
    • Privacy / Security
      • Allow GPG/PGP fingerprints in "To:" and (possibly) "CC:" and "BCC:" fields
      • Better explain "Missing Key" and provide useful UI actions for PGP
      • Create "crypto_state" for Attachment parts
      • Encrypted public key should be decrypted and properly imported
      • Handle GPG errors more gracefully and in a way that is useful to the user (renamed)
      • IMAP STARTTLS port 143 not connecting
      • Implement OpenPGP support (master ticket)
      • Implement STARTtls-everywhere
      • Improve PGP Support
      • Improve PGP compatibility of outoing mail?
      • MailLock!!! - a lock screen for your Mailpile
      • Make contacts in "Composer" allow for PGP keydiscovery
      • No TLS/SSL cert validation
      • PGP Encrypt & Sign fail poorly if Profile is missing PGP key
      • Perfect Forward Secrecy
      • Properly implement smart "crypto policy" support on a per-contact basis
      • Refactor Composer JS code
      • Separate web login password
      • Update crypto icons on messages as per ModernPGP spec
    • Usability
      • Folders not visible on lower resolutions
      • Improve & Fix Bugs in Setup Flow
      • Improve PGP Support
      • Make Setup Complete screen show downloading data
      • Provide UI confirmation feedback after "Add Contact"
      • Provide better UI feedback of Unread messages in thread
      • Rethink UX / UI of "Bulk Tag Picker"
    • Windows
      • Windows launcher crashes on shutdown
  • 1.1 Release
    • Back End
      • Add argument for attachment thumbnail size generation
      • Config should not remove unknown settings
      • Fix Parsing & Encoding of Snippets
      • Make it possible to import drafts as drafts from legacy clients
      • Perform better analysis of attachment (which is key)
      • Please augment the thread representation to include "events"
      • Plugin refactoring work
      • Protect message headers in encrypted mail (renamed)
      • Provide options for handling "multiple" PGP keys for a given contact
    • Bugs
      • Config should not remove unknown settings
      • Fix Parsing & Encoding of Snippets
    • Design
      • Delete confirmation message for trash items
      • Easy Attachment View and Navigation
      • Implement "Add To Group" actions
      • Support Multidirectionality out of the box.
    • Discussions
      • RFE: STEED Integration / Implementation
    • Front End
      • Add WYSIWYG editor to "Composer" probably markdown!
      • Attachment browser view
      • Create web UI views to create & edit "Filters"
      • Easy Attachment View and Navigation
      • Implement "Add To Group" actions
      • Implement auto suggest "Search" menu
      • Please augment the thread representation to include "events"
      • Plugin refactoring work
      • Provide options for handling "multiple" PGP keys for a given contact
    • Internationalization
      • Support Multidirectionality out of the box.
    • Low Hanging Fruit
      • Add "text resize" buttons to Conversation Thread
      • Add argument for attachment thumbnail size generation
      • Attachment browser view
    • Plugins
      • Attachment browser view
      • Plugin refactoring work
    • Privacy / Security
      • Move from OpenSSL to something faster for symmetric encryption
      • Provide options for handling "multiple" PGP keys for a given contact
      • RFE: STEED Integration / Implementation
    • Usability
      • Add "text resize" buttons to Conversation Thread
      • Delete confirmation message for trash items
      • Implement "Add To Group" actions
      • Move from OpenSSL to something faster for symmetric encryption
      • Support Multidirectionality out of the box.
  • Ideas - Code
    • Back End
      • Decouple the mail transport
      • Make Mailpile the best webmail option available for participating in text-only mailing lists
      • Make a subprocess variant of mailpile.crypto.EncryptingStreamer
      • SSL for XML-RPC/HTML UI
      • automations for tags
    • Design
      • Assigning signatures to emails by being "Context Aware"
    • Discussions
      • RFE: Let me limit the mails I can see when logging in from an untrusted location
    • Front End
      • automations for tags
    • Low Hanging Fruit
      • Make a subprocess variant of mailpile.crypto.EncryptingStreamer
    • Packaging & Defaults
      • SSL for XML-RPC/HTML UI
    • Plugins
      • Embridgy plugin that sends "webmentions" from social notification emails
    • Privacy / Security
      • Make a subprocess variant of mailpile.crypto.EncryptingStreamer
      • RFE: Let me limit the mails I can see when logging in from an untrusted location
  • Ideas - Design
    • Design
      • Be able to add tags to outgoing mail
      • Gracefully augment "Subject"
      • Make sidebar navigation "collapse" into single column
      • Why I use Outlook.com
      • Will need themes, or at least dark/night mode.
    • Discussions
      • Why I use Outlook.com
    • Front End
      • Be able to add tags to outgoing mail
      • Gracefully augment "Subject"
      • Hope for custom fontsettings (pixels!)
      • Make sidebar navigation "collapse" into single column
    • Usability
      • Hope for custom fontsettings (pixels!)
      • Will need themes, or at least dark/night mode.
  • Ideas - Multi User
    • Back End
      • CardDAV sync
      • multi account support?
    • Front End
      • multi account support?
    • Low Hanging Fruit
      • Sync addresses with LDAP
    • Plugins
      • Sync addresses with LDAP
  • Ideas - Plugins
    • Back End
      • Create plugin to evaluate whether messages are well formed
      • iOS Push Support
      • ownCloud plugin
    • Bugs
      • Create plugin to evaluate whether messages are well formed
    • Design
      • XMPP chat integration
    • Discussions
      • Optionally require recepient to read mail on your server
    • Front End
      • Clustered Data Visualization Style Inbox
    • Low Hanging Fruit
      • D3 mail statistics plugin
      • Explore differing UI approaches + technical backing of "Group" sending (ad-hoc/traditional mailing lists)
      • Make "map" view of contact locations plugin
      • Notes/memo feature
      • iOS Push Support
      • ownCloud plugin
    • Plugins
      • A mail analysis plugin that studies transport security of your mail
      • Calendar
      • Clustered Data Visualization Style Inbox
      • Create "Date" extraction plugin for Calendars, etc...
      • Create "Social Feed" plugin that renders a search result like a Facebook feed
      • Create a ToxMail plugin
      • D3 mail statistics plugin
      • Develop "Media Message" Plugin
      • Develop "SMS" Plugin
      • Email length detection / limiting / auto responders
      • Explore differing UI approaches + technical backing of "Group" sending (ad-hoc/traditional mailing lists)
      • IM: TextSecure federation
      • Make "map" view of contact locations plugin
      • MixMaster Support
      • Notes/memo feature
      • Optionally require recepient to read mail on your server
      • Verify plugin dependencies for integrity
      • iOS Push Support
      • ownCloud plugin
    • Privacy / Security
      • IM: TextSecure federation
      • MixMaster Support
      • Optionally require recepient to read mail on your server
    • Usability
      • Email length detection / limiting / auto responders
  • LEAP integration
    • Back End
      • Key lookup plugin handler
    • Privacy / Security
      • Key lookup plugin handler
  • Misc
    • Back End
      • A simple backup/restore of a user (with API/CLI)
      • Allow mailpile www server to run from subdirectory e.g. /mailpile/
      • Can't toggle encryption lock when composing a new message
      • Fix or remove the pgpbegin/pgpend/pgp* sections from message tree
      • Improve plugins/smtp_server.py
      • Include Hashcash support
      • Make has:attachment and friends into tags
      • Make spam detection aware of conversations
      • PGP smartcard support
      • Python 3.3+ support
      • Should the autotagger ignore messages we wrote?
      • Support nested Maildirs
    • Bugs
      • ./mp console display issue when using solarized colour scheme
      • Attached images are upscaled
      • Can't toggle encryption lock when composing a new message
      • Download/Leave on Server doesn't stay selected when changing options
      • Mailpile doesn't fit well in small screens
      • Malformed « From » display
      • XSS in profile settings
      • accessing encryption features?
    • Design
      • Mailpile doesn't fit well in small screens
      • Please make compose dialog fit on one screen
    • Discussions
      • All activities of a person
      • Feature Request: handle key rotation and expiration without losing access/info about old mail
      • Make login page more useful: show download progress and new mail stats?
      • Make spam detection aware of conversations
      • RFE: Trust on first contact opportunistic GPG
    • Documentation
      • Test/Installation on other UNIX-Systems
      • The Filters system needs to be documented
    • Front End
      • Add media=print stylesheet
      • All activities of a person
      • Allow mailpile www server to run from subdirectory e.g. /mailpile/
      • Download/Leave on Server doesn't stay selected when changing options
      • Improve "Language" editing via "setup" instance
      • Make has:attachment and friends into tags
      • Make lock icon on Composer provide key discovery options
      • Make login page more useful: show download progress and new mail stats?
      • Please make compose dialog fit on one screen
      • XSS in profile settings
    • IMAP
      • Drafts Folder Fills Up
      • Unstable connection to IMAP + ssl server (or wrong display of status?)
    • Internationalization
      • Write a translation plugin
    • Low Hanging Fruit
      • A simple backup/restore of a user (with API/CLI)
      • Add media=print stylesheet
      • Create a plugin allowing users to send password protected links to Mailpile's web server instead of attachments
      • Fix CLI interface to handle mixed output types from varying sources/threads/...
      • Implement the GMail API (server side)
      • Improve "Language" editing via "setup" instance
      • Improve plugins/smtp_server.py
      • Mailpile Analytics Reporting System
      • Make has:attachment and friends into tags
      • Make login page more useful: show download progress and new mail stats?
      • Protect users against phishing and viruses
      • Research: What are the optimal parameters for our spam filter?
      • Support nested Maildirs
      • The Filters system needs to be documented
      • Write a translation plugin
    • Packaging & Defaults
      • Feature Request: Synology NAS Package
    • Plugins
      • Create a plugin allowing users to send password protected links to Mailpile's web server instead of attachments
      • Implement the GMail API (server side)
      • Mailpile Analytics Reporting System
      • Write a translation plugin
    • Privacy / Security
      • Can't toggle encryption lock when composing a new message
      • Feature Request: handle key rotation and expiration without losing access/info about old mail
      • Improve plugins/smtp_server.py
      • Make lock icon on Composer provide key discovery options
      • PGP smartcard support
      • Practical security concerns (catch-all bug)
      • Protect users against phishing and viruses
      • accessing encryption features?
    • Spam
      • Include Hashcash support
      • Make spam detection aware of conversations
      • Should the autotagger ignore messages we wrote?
    • Usability
      • ./mp console display issue when using solarized colour scheme
      • Fix CLI interface to handle mixed output types from varying sources/threads/...
      • Make lock icon on Composer provide key discovery options
  • Plugin - Code Base
  • Plugin - Force Grapher
    • Design
      • Graph viewer UX
    • Low Hanging Fruit
      • Graph viewer UX
    • Plugins
      • Graph viewer UX
  • Plugin - Super Mailing Lister
    • Packaging & Defaults
      • Automatically filter mailing list messages into labels
    • Plugins
      • An easy to click "Ignore Thread" feature / button for mailing list messages
      • Create a "polling" feature for Mailing Lists
      • Create encrypted email "mailing list"
      • Easy way to unsubscribe from mailing lists and notifications
      • Implement a "Follow Conversation" feature
      • Link to mailing list post
      • Provide support for @localnicknames throughout Mailpile
